root.name: Hugo
root.description: Scylla, Hugo and his familyThe goal in the games is to guide the small friendly troll Hugo through a series of verious challenges on the way to liberate his family, which has been kidnapped by the evil witch Scylla.This is a compilation consisting of Hugo - På Nye Eventyr and Hugo - På Nye Eventyr Del 2. The PlayStation version sported improved graphics and sounds.
